content:
Weiss family

1 Jozef WEISS                        1792-96
 + Kayli HASTROW                     1797-99 - May 1, 1874 #194 (Lewek)
  2x Moyzesz WEISS                   1832 #303 - 1832 #310
  2o daughter WEISS                  1835 #39 - 1835 #5
  2x Samson WEISS                    Jul 4, 1837 #341
    + Perla FERBER                   Feb 9, 1837 #314
             married Jul 14, 1889 #87
     3o Dwora (Debora) WEISS         Jan 2, 1863 #105
       * Saul Salomon LIEBESKIND     Apr 15, 1858 Krakow
             married Jul 14, 1889 #88
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Eva WEISS                    Sep 2, 1864 #826
     3o Ryfka Rachel WEISS           May 5, 1866 #325
       * Mendel Hirsch RAUCHER       Nov 13, 1864 #972 - after 1911
             married Jul 14, 1889 #89
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Michal Jozef WEISS           Sep 20, 1868 #627
       + Ella SCHLEICHKORN           Oct 12, 1874 #587
             married Nov 14, 1894 Podgorze
        4o Sabina WEISS              Dec 11, 1895 #853
        4o Kamila WEISS              Jan 26, 1898 #68
        4x Ludwik WEISS
     3x Aron WEISS                   May 10, 1870 #301
     3x Lobel (Leon) WEISS           Aug 23, 1871 #536

     3x Israel WEISS                 Jun 24, 1876 #421
     3x Abraham WEISS                Jul 31, 1878 #469
       + Cyrla RAUCHER               Nov 11, 1890 #742
             married Mar 21, 1912 #82  uncle-niece
        4o Gusta WEISS               Mar 3, 1913 #169
  2x Herszel WEISS                   Jun 4, 1840 #308




1 Joachim WEISS
 + Chai                              - 1835 #115 (Markus)
  2x Jozef WEISS                     1813-14 - before 1877
    + Feigel WUNDISCH                1811-12 - Nov 12, 1880 #496
          married 1835 #5
     3o Beile Breindel WEISS         1844 Chrzanow
       * Izrael Kopel ROSENSTRAUCH   Feb 23, 1839 #138
           FAMILY LISTING




1 Majer WEISS
 + Hai 
  2x Jozef WEISS                     1813-14 - 1852 #383
    + Sara FLEISZER                  1813-15 - 1848 #158 (Majer+Hanny)
     3o Hanna Scheindel WEISS        1836 #527 - after 1890
       * Juda Leib KANTOR            1833 #131 - Jan 26, 1879 #34
             married 1854-70
     3x Moyzesz Mejer WEISS          Feb 4, 1838 #48 - Jun 15, 1883 #214
       + Debora Eidel NIEDES         Jul 6, 1839 #495
        4o Sara Reisel WEISS         Aug 11, 1864 (1865 #44) - May 1, 1903 #13680 Manhattan NY
      ??  * Isak Aron KREINDEL       Oct 16, 1857 #1033
      ??      FAMILY LISTING
        4x Joachim WEISS             Oct 22, 1866 #698
          + Mirjam STURZ             Oct 13, 1874 #590
                married Dec 26, 1893 #287
           5o Gusta WEISS            Dec 11, 1901 #793
        4o Scheindel WEISS           1869 #79 - Sep 24, 1870 #471
        4o Rifke WEISS               1873 #156
        4o Feigel WEISS (twin)       Apr 27, 1875 #282 - Feb 6, 1876 #43
        4o Frumet WEISS (twin)       Apr 27, 1875 #283
        4x Izak WEISS                Dec 25, 1876 (1877 #12)
        4o Chaja WEISS               Nov 18, 1878 #722
        4o Itel WEISS                Sep 21, 1881 #591
     3o Ester WEISS                  Aug 13, 1840 #458
     3x son WEISS                    1843 #54 - 1843 #38
     3o Jentla WEISS                 - 1852 #118
